response.overview: A saga centered on a multi-generational family of New York City Police officers. The family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney, investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

production_companies.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 1 KG

response.tagline: Truth. Honor. Loyalty. Family. What are you willing to sacrifice?
response.title: Pride and Glory

titles.title: Pride and Glory - Il prezzo dell'onore
